column2: an A.M. Eatery////I also sampled the sausage
column4: and hash browns from another member of my party. They were okay
column5: but when it comes to simple brunch items like those
column6: I'd be pretty disappointed if they were anything less than okay. The line at Snooze
column8: is because there's nowhere else to go for brunch aside from IHOP or Denny's. While this place is in fact better than both of those
column9: I'd say it wasn't by a huge margin
column10: or one large enough to justify a long wait or hefty price tag. 3 stars.
